item.title: Hugo
item.description: It’s storytime! I’m switching to Hugo! Prologue: Installing Hugo So I open up the Hugo installation page, Ctrl-f-ed for “Ubuntu”, saw that it was available via apt, and installed it. Everything goes smoothly, and moving over my (very little) content was super easy. I mostly abandon my old theme and cobble something new together based on the Gokarna theme. Awesome! The migration is basically done! (Narrator: …little did she know…)
